title: Spirit Gaurd Udyr phoenix stance sound bug
body: Somewhere around mid game all of a sudden i hear phoenix stance sounds whenever i enter any other stance. I hear the sound of the stance i entered and overlapped on it i hear phoenix stance as well. Persisted for the rest of the game. This doesnt happen every game but ive seen it happen quite a few times now. Usually starts after i recall and reach base in phoenix stance.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! 

I'll look into it! {{champion:99}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=aenEAEPN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-05T06:43:43.992+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! 
> 
> I'll look into it! {{champion:99}}

This appens when you die in a maxed stance, if you die in Phoenix Stance all the sound will be phoenix and go on.

Look [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/0Xg7n7MJ-gameplay-spirit-guard-udyr-still-bugged-after-the-fix-this-time-its-major-sound-issues) post for more info about this annoying problem.
I'll attempt to test that, see if I can reproduce it more reliably.
